data.title: Area for motorhomes
data.text:
GPS coordinates : 50.605702, 3.380157

Rules and regulation

Services

Access to water, electricity, emptying, waste sorting

Pic-nic benches made of recycled materials

Controlled access and secure site

Reservation possible in advance

Rates

01/10 > 30/04 : 8 €/night

01/05 > 30/09 : 10 €/night

Water without overnight stay : 0,75 € (50l.)

Water discharge / flush : free

>>> Overnight stay until noon (12 u) the day after (with electricity, water, emptying)

How to reserve a pitch for 1 or 2 nights ? Nothing could be easier ! 3 ways to manage :

1) At the entrance of the site, do it yourself :

Scan the QR code on the terminal, fill in the fields on the online reservation form and make the payment. Your order entitles you to a parking space, drinking water and electricity accessible from noon on the day of your reservation until noon the following day (or the day after, depending on your choice of 24 or 48 hours).

Note: when you make your reservation, if you notice that one of the pitches numbered from 1 to 12 is not available, it is simply because it is already reserved by another user. As soon as you have paid, you will receive a personal QR code by e-mail. This will allow you to open the gate and obtain drinking water. This code may be requested for verification in case of a check during your stay. The parking spaces are numbered from 1 to 12. Park on the pitch you choose when you make your reservation. Electricity will be directly available at this location. To obtain drinking water : connect your hose to the water point. Scan your personal QR code directly on the water terminal via the QR code reader. Water is available instantly once you scan your code. You have 50 litres of water available. This operation can be repeated if necessary, at no extra cost.

2) Before your visit, reserve in advance via the website i-marina:

Follow the instuctions. After payment, you will receive a personal QR code by e-mail, it will allow you to open the gate. Your order entitles you to a parking space, drinking water and electricity accessible from noon on the day of your reservation until noon the following day (or the day after, depending on your choice of 24 or 48 hours).

Note: when you make your reservation, if you notice that one of the pitches numbered from 1 to 12 is not available, it is simply because it is already reserved by another user.. This code may be requested for verification in case of a check during your stay. The parking spaces are numbered from 1 to 12. Park on the pitch you choose when you made your reservation. Electricity will be directly available at this location. To obtain drinking water : connect your hose to the water point. Scan your personal QR code directly on the water terminal via the QR code reader. Water is available instantly once you scan your code. You have 50 litres of water available. This operation can be repeated if necessary, at no extra cost.

3) At the Tourist Office during opening hours

Our staff helps you making your reservation and will print your personal QR code, after payment. This code will allow you to open the gate on the site. It may be requested for verification in case of a check during your stay. The parking spaces are numbered from 1 to 12. Park on the pitch you choose when you make your reservation. Your order entitles you to a parking space, drinking water and electricity accessible from noon on the day of your reservation until noon the following day (or the day after, depending on your choice of 24 or 48 hours).

Electricity will be directly available at this location. To obtain drinking water : connect your hose to the water point. Scan your personal QR code directly on the water terminal via the QR code reader. Water is available instantly once you scan your code. You have 50 litres of water available. This operation can be repeated if necessary, at no extra cost.

Do you wish to use drinking water without staying overnight ?

Connect your hose to the water supply point at the designated spot.

Then scan the QR code on the drinking water side of the terminal. Place your order online.

The water is available immediately after payment. You have +/- 50 litres of water available. This operation can be repeated if necessary.

Would you like to empty and flush your chemical toilet ?

Simply scan the QR code that is placed on the water supply point on the chemical toilet side.

Place your order. The water is available as soon as the order has been placed.

This action is free and can be repeated if necessary.

Contact ?

Tournai Tourism Office

Place Paul-Emile Janson 1, 7500 Tournai, Belgium

+32 (0) 69 22 20 45

info.visit@tournai.be

en.visittournai.be

Reception area for motorhomes : Ferme du Vert Marais

Service area for motorhomes (emptying, water, electricity, sanitary facilities, children's playground, farm products and animals, marked country paths).

14 green and spacious places are available for motorhomes. Each area is spaced by hedges.

Chemin Landaise 5/8 - 7501 ORCQ

Information and réservations : olivier.vansteenbrugge@kipland.be or 0032 475 39 74 40

15€/night

Do you like camping?

Camping de l'Orient is located 4 km from the historic centre of Tournai, right next to the entrance to the Aqua Tournai site.

Open all year round, the campsite offers a number of marked pitches with water, electricity, sanitary facilities (showers and toilets) and outdoor wifi included in the price. There is also a small shop and the possibility of ordering from the bakery the day before for the morning.

Attention !

The Orient site (swimming pool, club house terrace and pedal boats) is NO LONGER ACCESSIBLE to the general public until further notice (major renovation work in progress).

Rates 2023 (VAT included)

Children under 6 years old : free

Children from 6 to 12 years old : 4€/night

Adult : 5€/night

Car : 4€/night

Tent : 4€/night

Caravan : 5€/night

Motorbike, trailer : 4€/night

Motorhome : 7€/night

Overnight stay all taxes included: 20€/night (the package is applied for 2 nights maximum and includes all vehicles, 2 adults + children)

Miscellaneous
